thread.section_title: eDreams opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre eDreams | www.edreams.es | 2 de 76
thread.title: candice

author: candice
title: candice
text: Hello, I made a mistake in my booking and called to cancel so that I could re-book at the proper date. I was really pleasantly surprised! I spoke to three people and all three were really lovely and super helpful and understanding. I wish I had written the names of the two women who helped me, but I didn't. The last person I spoke to was Abhishek Kapoor. Thank you to Abhishek and your team!
